comment: по клику на пьяницу в баре

languages.text: "Если переживу все это, брошу пить, клянусь! После того как выпью за новую жизнь, конечно же..."

traits.locale_text: "Если переживу все это, брошу пить, клянусь! После того как выпью за новую жизнь, конечно же..."

languages.text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."
languages.original_text: "Если переживу все это, брошу пить, клянусь! После того как выпью за новую жизнь, конечно же..."

traits.locale_text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll become a teetotaller! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."
"I swear, if I survive this I'll become a teetotaller! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."
"I swear, if I survive this I'll become a teetotaller! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."
"I swear, if I survive this I'll become a teetotaller! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."
"I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."
"I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."

languages.text: “我发誓，如果我能活下来的话，我就戒酒！不过当然了，戒酒之前，我得先举杯庆祝我们美好的新生活……”
languages.original_text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."

traits.locale_text: “我发誓，如果我能活下来的话，我就戒酒！不过当然，戒酒之前，我得先举杯庆祝我们美好的新生活……”

languages.text: 「もしこの戦を生き延びたら、禁酒するって誓うぜ！まぁ、勝利の乾杯をしてからの話だけどな」
languages.original_text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."

traits.locale_text: 「もしこの戦を生き延びたら、禁酒するって誓うぜ！まぁ、勝利の乾杯をしてからの話だけどな」

languages.text: «¡Juro que si sobrevivo esto dejaré el alcohol! Pero no sin antes brindar por nuestra nueva y mejor vida, por supuesto...».
languages.original_text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Juro que si sobrevivo esto dejaré el alcohol! Pero no sin antes brindar por nuestra nueva y mejor vida, por supuesto...».

languages.text: "Ich schwöre, wenn ich das überlebe, werde ich Abstinenzler! Aber natürlich nicht, bevor wir auf ein neues und besseres Leben anstoßen ..."
languages.original_text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre, wenn ich das überlebe, werde ich Abstinenzler! Aber natürlich nicht, bevor wir auf ein neues und besseres Leben anstoßen ..."

languages.text: « Je jure que si je survis, j'arrête de boire ! Enfin, après avoir levé mon verre à notre nouvelle vie, bien sûr... »
languages.original_text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."

traits.locale_text: « Je jure que si je survis, j'arrête de boire ! Enfin, après avoir levé mon verre à notre nouvelle vie, bien sûr... »

languages.text: "Yemin ediyorum buradan sağ çıkabilirsem içkiyi bırakacağım! Fakat önce bu yeni ve müthiş hayatımıza bir kadeh kaldırmak lazım."
languages.original_text: "I swear, if I survive this I'll go teetotal! But not before raising a glass to our new and better life, of course..."

traits.locale_text: "Yemin ediyorum buradan sağ çıkabilirsem içkiyi bırakacağım! Ama ondan önce bu yeni ve müthiş hayatımıza bir kadeh kaldırmam gerekir elbette."
